Class NutritionOptimisation

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class NutritionOptimisation
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    A class which tells you if you're higher or lower than the GDA values

        public static double[] totalNutrition(double[][] nutritionalValues)
        Returns the total nutritional values.
        Parameters:
        nutritionalValues - An array of the nutritional values for each of the food item.

      • compareCalories

        public static java.lang.String compareCalories(Person p,
                                               MealPlanner m)
        Returns a string detailing which nutritional values are higher or lower, within 10% either way lower or higher
        Parameters:
        values - The total nutritional values of the foods
        gdaValues - The recommended daily values of the person
        descriptions - The names of the GDA values, eg. Calories
        Returns:
        A string detailing which nutritional values are higher or lower

      • compareToGDAWeek

        public static java.lang.String compareToGDAWeek(Person p,
                                                MealPlanner m)
        Returns a string detailing which nutritional values are higher or lower for a week, within 10% either way lower or higher
        Parameters:
        values - The total nutritional values of the foods
        gdaValues - The recommended daily values of the person
        descriptions - The names of the GDA values, eg. Calories
        Returns:
        A string detailing which nutritional values are higher or lower for a week
